name: Iron Puppets
description:
IRON PUPPETS
A mazing tower defence game with roguelike elements



Keep enemies away from the core by building laborants using the towers you unlock. 

This is an early prototype, so a lot of stuff will be missing (like sound) , but i hope you enjoy the game and gladly leave your feedback.

join the discord and tell me yourself?
https://discord.gg/C9mBqTjAQ8
